name: MyDailyDigital
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: It is well known that businesses must have an online presence to succeed, today. With so much information available how do you know what to do? My Daily Digital is set to share tips and tricks to help the small, medium, or large business owner navigate the digital marketing landscape.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
